author: ghosts_in_the_code
content:
Q
 - Scaling Tor or mixnets
 - Getting good guarantees of Tor actually defending privacy against state-level actors
 - Validators being able to sync and attest over Tor

author: ghosts_in_the_code
content: IMO basically everything else in blockchain is relatively unimportant until things like this are solved

author: 0xraino
content: interesting. first I've heard of this. why is it such high priority?
